channel.title: [Old School] Lost Island [317]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/7086/lostisland.png[/img][/center]
[center]Lost Island[/center] [center][size=10pt]Lost Island is a Server That is strictly old school but not a rs remake, We just want to have an old server that looks fun and is fun, I would like the server to gradually grow.[/size][/center]
What this server features:
A unique home where training becomes a influential thing... Adding skilling zone for all skills, with very unique ideas for this, will not release any further info till later ;)
[size=24pt][b]MEDIA[/b][/size]
NPC's at home [img]http://img805.imageshack.us/img805/2998/npchome1.png[/img]
NPC's at Home [img]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/4545/npchome2.png[/img]
Where Shops Will be added: [img]http://img607.imageshack.us/img607/5537/shopsz.png[/img]
Starting Spot and Starter.... [img]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/6052/startingareaandstarter.png[/img]
Shops Updated: [img]http://img831.imageshack.us/img831/2458/shopsadded.png[/img]
[img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/691/clancapes.png[/img]
[img]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/3943/drags.png[/img]
[img]http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/1083/generalqi.png[/img]
[img]http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/6551/rangesupplies.png[/img]
[img]http://img28.imageshack.us/img28/3561/rangey.png[/img]
[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4935/robes.png[/img]
Skilling Zone ( THANKS TO PKJADSCAPE or Pking4Fam )
[img]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/5998/skillersarea.png[/img]
[center][size=18pt]Credits:[/size][/center] [size=20pt]iX Soulcist Xi for his wonderful clean base (bronze age) Pking4Fam for his skiller zone.[/size]
[center][size=18pt]Positions Available:[/size][/center]
Hoster: [code]Name: How long can you host: Have you hosted before: Age: msn or skype:[/code]
Coder: [code]Name: Experience: Age: Any proof: msn or skype:[/code]
GFX Designer: [code]Name: Experience: Programs used: Example of work: msn or skype:[/code]
Beta Tester: [code]Name: Age: msn or skype:[/code]
Web Developer [code]name: Age: Web coding experience: How long coding: php or html: msn or skype:[/code]
Beta Testers [code] Name: Age: Msn or skype: why you:[/code]
[size=72pt]NOTE:[/size] [size=36pt]This was an old topic That I have bumped so any positions that have been applied, are no longer valid. I stopped the other server because Someone who I was dropboxxing with deleted the files so, I started on this.[/size]

item.title: [Old School] Lost Island [317]
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“lugmfr, post:17, topic:412722”]I released this -__-[/quote]Yeah I gave you complete credits to you

Mendorphins:

Old school? You have a 508 character model in the banner…

Its only the banner :o

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:13, topic:412722”]So, you’re going to get a ‘coder’ to program your source completely for you, why you sit back and watch?
That’s a lot and a very time consuming list you have up there.[/quote]
No as a matter of fact I kinda looked up a few tuts and accomplished a few of those tasks on the list.[quote=“Mod Lucas, post:9, topic:412722”][quote author=Mikeyzzz link=topic=514198.msg3732646#msg3732646 date=1314702628]

Why dont you use your own pics? In sure these are not yours

Yeah they arent mine bu theres no point my source is that till i finish coding in my updates
[/quote]

Then don’t post any at all, because right now it makes you look bad.
Also, don’t use project 2006, use PI.

If you want, I have a 100% working cooking(for project 2006) with REAL RUNESCAPE burning formula,
all food and more. It’s for sale at only $10 via paypal.[/quote]

And ugh no thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: [Old School] Lost Island [317]
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Lucas Mod Lucas
item.description:
@Mod_Lucas wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:15, topic:412722”][quote author=Mod Lucas link=topic=514198.msg3733374#msg3733374 date=1314747570]

Why dont you use your own pics? In sure these are not yours

Yeah they arent mine bu theres no point my source is that till i finish coding in my updates

Also, don’t use project 2006, use PI.

Anything is better then PI.

How so?

Pi is, disorganized and clutterly. Because of this it greatly restricts your efficiency level at achieving your goals.

Disorganized? I haven’t seen a source this much organized… What the hell have you been smoking?!

Also, it’s time all wannabe-coders learn that if you use an IDE, everything becomes easier as all the available
java syntax either from java libraries or the server-side classes, is available to you without having to look
trough most of the files to find something you need.
[/quote]

Project insanity is the worst source ever. Although I program with it as it’s easy to use, it has many dead locks and memory leaks, (I have figured out out to optimize the server and fix most of the leaks) but besides that, it is not organized that well, it’s shit overall. And why use a IDE that will tell you, that you missed a import to something, and not learn anything?[/quote]

That’s how some people learn. I downloaded eclipse like 2 weeks ago… wow, made my life like 100 times simplier.

Read full topic
